ca.hullabaloo.util.sax
Class SaxBuffer

java.lang.Object
  ca.hullabaloo.util.sax.SaxBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler
public class SaxBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler

A class that can record SAX events and replay them later.

Use this class if you need to frequently generate smaller amounts of SAX events, or replay a set of recorded start events immediately.

Both ContentHandler and LexicalHandler are supported, the only exception is that the setDocumentLocator event is not recorded.

The original package for this class is org.apache.cocoon.xml

Note this class is not strictly thread-safe, although once the buffer is built, you can safely call toSAX() from multiple threads (as long as there are no concurrent modifications).

append

public void append(SaxBuffer saxBuffer)
Appends the bits in the SaxBuffer to this Buffer. Much the same as otherBuffer.toSax(thisBuffer), except doesn't create new copies of the bits objects.

Parameters:
saxBuffer - the buffer to append
